author: Erica Orden
title: Company Hid Ties to Former Cuomo Aide’s Wife, Consultant Says in New York Corruption Trial
text:
An energy company that allegedly bribed a former aide to New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo by hiring the aide’s wife sought to mask her involvement with the company by omitting her name and image from promotional material, a consultant to the company testified Friday in a federal corruption trial.
In teaching materials, pamphlets, photos and tweets, Competitive Power Ventures went out of its way to avoid indicating that Lisa Percoco, the former aide’s wife, was employed by the company’s educational program, the consultant testified.
